main event: A round object was observed in Long Beach, New York, on November 2, 1957, appearing bright and changing in brightness.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a dime when bright and the size of a head of a pin when dim., The object was emitting light rays., Local fighter aircraft reported that Venus and search lights were the only possible explanations for the sighting., The length of the observation was between 2 to 5 minutes., One student from Long Beach High School was confirmed as a witness.
witness description: students from Long Beach High School
